story.overall_description: This video series documents the morning domestic routine of a resident in a ground-floor home in the Indian states of Andhra Pradesh or Telangana. The narrative follows a logical sequence: sweeping the marble floors of the bedroom (Clip 1) and main living hall (Clip 2), organizing and folding laundry (Clip 3), cleaning furniture (Clip 4), and concluding with religious rituals in a dedicated prayer room (Clip 5). The footage provides granular details on the resident's religious beliefs, linguistic background (Telugu), socioeconomic status, and daily habits.

cross_clip_threats.title: High-Confidence Geolocation via Language and Products
cross_clip_threats.why_amplified_across_clips: While Clip 1 and 3 suggest a South Asian context via decor and attire, Clip 5 provides definitive geolocation markers. The devotional book features Telugu script, narrowing the location to Andhra Pradesh or Telangana, India. This is corroborated by the 'Home Lites' matchbox (an Indian brand).
cross_clip_threats.evidence_summary: Telugu text on prayer book + 'Home Lites' matchbox + Tropical vegetation/architecture.
mitigation_ideas: blur text on books and products

cross_clip_threats.title: Persistent Re-identification via Attire and Jewelry
cross_clip_threats.why_amplified_across_clips: The wearer is visually tracked across all clips through identical markers: a yellow floral-print dress, a set of red bangles on both wrists, and a green bracelet. This continuity links the physical labor of cleaning (Clips 1-2) with the intimate religious activities in Clip 5.
cross_clip_threats.evidence_summary: Red bangles + Green bracelet + Yellow floral dress consistent across all clips.

cross_clip_threats.title: Comprehensive Floor Plan Reconstruction
cross_clip_threats.why_amplified_across_clips: The video sequences map the entire home layout. Clip 1 shows the bedroom; Clip 2 reveals the central hall connecting the bedroom to the entrance; Clip 3 shows the storage area/patio access; Clip 5 shows the prayer room. This sequential movement allows for a near-complete schematic of the residence.
cross_clip_threats.evidence_summary: Bedroom -> Living Hall -> Utility Area -> Prayer Room flow.
